advert.tc:
- Harnesses available to fit children aged 3 up to adults weighing up to 120kg/260lbs.
- Children under 12 years of age must be accompanied by an adult and all persons under 18 years must have our Medical Declaration & - Waiver Release signed by a parent or guardian prior to the tour.
- No prior experience or specific fitness required.
- If you have restricted mobility or are concerned about a specific medical condition, please contact us prior to the tour and we will be happy to discuss your requirements and make our best efforts to accommodate you.
- Not recommended for pregnant women.
-  Jungle Surfing is closed New Year’s Day.
-  Prices for children are available upon application only.
- 100% cancellation policy applies if not cancelled 24 hours before departure
advert.description:
Depart Cairns and travel to Port Douglas via the Captain Cook Highway, one of Australia’s most scenic coastal drives. Commence pickups from Port Douglas accommodation. 

Arrive at The Wildlife Habitat. Join a guided tour and see the endangered cassowary and other wildlife, with the opportunity to have your photo taken holding a koala, snake or crocodile (extra cost). Morning tea included. 

Depart The Wildlife Habitat. Cross the Daintree River on the cable-driven ferry. Travel along the rainforest-fringed Cape Tribulation Road through Daintree National Park, a magnificent wilderness region. 

Arrive at the Turtle Rock Cafe for a Tropical Lunch. Depart for Jungle Surfing - a unique rainforest tour where your feet don’t touch the ground. Fly through the trees on ziplines, with a bird’s eye view into the canopy and out to the reef. 

Depart Cape Tribulation for return journey, with some comfort stops along the way. Stop at Alexandra Lookout for magnificent views. 

Depart north side of river for the Daintree River Cruise. Spot crocodiles, birds and other wildlife as you journey through the mangroves. Arrive south-side of river. Arrive at Port Douglas accommodation.

Arrive at Cairns accommodation.

TOUR HIGHLIGHTS
- Scenic journey along the Great Barrier Reef Drive from Cairns to - - -- Port Douglas
- Wildlife Habitat
- Daintree River Cable Ferry
- Tropical Lunch
- Jungle Surfing Canopy Tour
- Alexandra Lookout
- Daintree River Cruise
- Return Transfers

WHAT TO BRING
- Money for drinks and snacks	
- Your Ticket
- Camera	
- Hat
- Water Resistant 50+ sunscreen	
- Insect Repellent
- Walking Shoes	
- Bottle of Water
- Swimming Costume & Towel (Optional)


ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
-  Skirts and dresses are not reccommended on this tour.
-  Please also wear closed in shoes. 
-  Ex Cairns, Beaches & Port Douglas
advert.summary: Travel to Cape Tribulation and experience this exciting activity, all in one day!
advert.title: Go Jungle Surfing Day Tour from $252
